title: Verify: Implement Retrieval Tool and Facts Pack Injection in Lane B
description:
Run automated tests for task T-009.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Implement the tool call in Lane B ReasoningEngine to retrieve facts packs from the retrieval service and inject them into the instruction set for responses about NextGen AI. Ensure citations are included for audit.
Criteria:
- Lane B can call the retrieval service with transcript queries
- Facts pack is injected into Lane B's instruction set
- Structured citations are included in Lane B's internal audit events
- Responses about NextGen AI use retrieved facts consistently
